**Who Benefits:**

**Scope:**
- [ ] Small: Limited to one module
- [ ] Medium: Affects multiple modules
- [ ] Large: Major architectural change

**Breaking Change:**
- [ ] Yes - Would break existing code
- [ ] No - Fully backward compatible
- [ ] Maybe - Depends on implementation
